short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 展示你的收藏夹，平铺书签，方便快速找到
short.en: Display your favorites, lay out the bookmarks for easy and quick access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
- 简洁。简洁平铺书签，方便快速找到链接。
- 流畅。轻量级应用，1秒加载完成。
long.en:
- Concise. Neatly arrange bookmarks for easy and quick link access. 
- Smooth. Lightweight application, loads in 1 second. 
- Secure. No network requests, privacy protected.
